Package hepsim

The goal of this package is to provide some useful utils for the HepSim library

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Exec
    Static class to run external command over sample.
    Extract
    Create a new file from the ProMC input using N events.
    Find
    Static class to find a simulated files.
    Get
    Downloading ProMC files in multiple threads from the HepSim library
    HepSim
    Static class to handle HepSim data using URL.
    Info
    Validate a ProMC file.
    Ls
    Static class to list HepSim data using URL.
    MixPileup
    Mix events with pileups using a fixed and or a poisson distributions.
    Zip64
    ProMC distiller.

Package hepsim Description

The goal of this package is to provide some useful utils for the HepSim library
